TopicTitle: [0.90] ON HOLD Klockheed Martian Special Parts V2.2 - 28-Nov - Dev Thread

Articles.Content: open the alt+f12 menu and on the bottom of the cheats page check the one about the nodes, it will be the last option. It lets you attach any node to any other node ignoring the fact that there are +1 and -1 oriented nodes now.

I don't appreciate being rushed on things and to be perfectly honest I have this thing that for each person who constantly whines about something it delays me working on the mod for that much longer.

And just how was I rushing you? I simply said I liked the inflatable floats from the special parts mod. That does not sound whiny to me! You need to put a check on your ego buddy or get laid because you can be quite rude! A simple - You can still use the old parts and It's on my list to be updated and I'll get to it eventually - would have sufficed.

You know if you are going to whine about being over loaded maybe you should not take over so many peoples mods then let them languish and then get all pissy when folks ask for an update on your progress.

You know if you are going to whine about being over loaded maybe you should not take over so many peoples mods then let them languish and then get all pissy when folks ask for an update on your progress.

How many people's mods have I taken over? This is the only one as far as I am aware, the only other time I tried to help with a mod I was harassed and threatened by the fanboys of the guy whose mod it didn't even belong to, he was just maintaining it! If you think I'm like "one of those guys" who grabs tons of mods and then ditches them, maybe I should act like it and just not update this at all then, that cool with you buddy? It's obvious nobody on this website appreciates anything anybody does, more free stuff with no work for them means more better.

Edited May 20, 2015 by raidernick
